description:
Freakin' sweet! Come spend some time with the Griffins in this outrageously funny game where you play as the eccentric Peter Griffin, the brilliantly sadistic baby Stewie, and other favorite characters from the Family Guy TV show. It's funny, it's uncensored, it's just plain wrong!

8 OUTRAGEOUS MINI-GAMES
Play through over 40 levels across 8 unique mini-game types including:

Brian vs. Stewie
Stewie wants his money back! Can you help Brian escape Stewie's barrage of weaponry?

Peter vs. Chicken
Battle Peter's nemesis in this addictive game.

Robo Stewie
Battle Bertram's minions in this homage to classic 16-bit gaming.

Sketch Arcade
Take control of Chris's spaceship as he battles Meg-pigs and the infamous Evil Monkey!

Jungle Love
It’s Quagmire's ultimate jungle fantasy. Can you reach Amazon Lois and fulfil his dream?

CHARACTER CAMEOS
Appearances by Joe, Cleveland, Opie, Bertram, Olivia, and many more! 

ORIGINAL STORY 
True to the series, cut-aways and character interactions lead you through a hilariously original story. Follow the residents of Quahog as they deal with a power outage that has swept through the town!

LIVE THE QUAHOG LIFE
The town of Quahog comes to life as you visit familiar place including Spooner Street, City Hall, and The Drunken Clam
